stories.title: Who Wants a Nice Tall Glass of Coca-Cola's Algorithmic Orange Juice? (2013)

stories.text: I am aware of services like Stripe Atlas but it seems like they are a better fit for founders who are not already in the United States. For a US Citizen founder living in the United States, what is the most fast/efficient way in 2021 to setup a Corporation (C Corp). Current options seem like: Stripe Atlas, delawareinc.com etc other than good old DIY or through a CPA. Any other services that make it fast and easy ?
stories.title: Ask HN: As a US based founder, what is the best way to setup a Corporation?
Elizabeth Holmes Trial: Why Not Other Tech CEOs?

What difference will jabbing young teens make?
TikTok Users Watch Nancy Pelosi for Stock Trade Tips from Congress Disclosures

stories.text: Olivier Breton, the CEO of Niceboard.co himself abusively destroyed 10 of our websites and the data of around 8000 users, and we require that he restore our data and refund our $3750 paid to him upfront for lifetime access to his software. Furthermore, he refused to replies to multiple emails my partner or I sent to him and blocked us on his social media accounts.
stories.title: Stay away from Niceboard-co Olivier Breton

stories.text:
https://twitter.com/adamthesherwood/status/1401308468263325698:

A fundamental component of classical art training was copying works by masters.

What are the masterworks of software engineering?
stories.title: Ask HN: What Are the Masterworks of Software?
